title: LUMINESS Silk Airbrush Spray Foundation - Full Coverage Foundation - Formula Hydrates & Moisturizes with Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe Vera & Hydrolyzed Silk (Shade - Tan)
features: Airbrush in a Can: LUMINESS Silk Airbrush Spray Foundation covers imperfections, fine lines and wrinkles for a flawless, airbrushed finish — no device needed. Provides medium, buildable coverage for a customized look. Must use with Buffing Brush (sold separately). 2oz Bottle. Shade: Tan

Hydrate and Smooth Skin: Formulated with the ultimate skin conditioning, plumping, hydrating, and replenishing skincare ingredients including Hydrolyzed Silk and hydrating Hyaluronic Acid to support skin’s elasticity.

Basic Application Tips: Shake well before use. Spray onto brush, holding can 1” away (this sanitary application method keeps you from using your fingers). Apply onto skin using buffing motions. Reapply as needed.
Reasons to Love LUMINESS: Quickly & easily apply this lightweight, buildable formula for an airbrushed finish in seconds!

From the Leaders in Airbrush Cosmetics: Nearly 25 years ago, we began a mission to provide innovative beauty solutions, not compromised by the constraints of the traditional beauty market. Luminess has taken the technology once only available through airbrush and developed an innovative, blendable Airbrush Spray Foundation to achieve ultra-fine mist application for a flawless finish.
